forrest_ground_01_4k.optimized_prompt: A ball rests on a sunlit grassy field. It begins to roll forward gently, picking up speed as it moves across the uneven terrain. The sunlight casts dynamic shadows, adding depth to their movement.

aerial_grass_rock_4k.optimized_prompt: A ball begins to roll gently across a sunlit, textured surface, casting a soft shadow beneath it. As it moves, it gradually picks up speed, navigating the subtle undulations of the ground. The ball's smooth, glossy surface glimmers in the light, creating a dynamic play of reflections.

gravel_ground_01_4k.optimized_prompt: A ball rests on a sandy surface, casting a soft shadow beneath it. Suddenly, the ball begins to roll, its path slightly curving as it navigates the uneven terrain. As the ball gains momentum, it kicks up small puffs of sand, leaving a faint trail behind. The scene is serene, with the gentle movement of the ball adding a dynamic element to the tranquil setting.
